  • Method Details

    • addCourse

      boolean addCourse(int courseCode, int studentId, List<Course> courseList) throws CourseNotFoundException, CourseLimitExceedException, SeatNotAvailableException, SQLException
      Method to add Course selected by student
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course Code
      studentId - Student ID
      courseList - List Of Courses
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the course is added successfully
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - If course is not Found
      CourseLimitExceedException - If course limit is not found
      SeatNotAvailableException - If seat is not available
      SQLException - If SQL is not found

    • dropCourse

      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course Code
      studentId - Student ID
      registeredCourseList - List Of Registered Courses
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the course is dropped successfully
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - If Course is not found
      SQLException - If SQL is not found
